  1. import pycurl
  2. import json
  3. from .curl import curl_connection
  4. from .decorators import check
  7. class bitbucket_check(curl_connection):
  9. """Bitbucket check class contain all checking points for bitbucket repository, return True if fail"""
  11. def __init__(self, username, password, service):
  12. super(bitbucket_check, self).__init__(username, password)
  13. self.service = service
  15. @check('Bitbucket')
  16. def check_authentication(self):
  17. self.authenticate()
  18. self.perform('https://bitbucket.org/api/1.0/user/repositories')
  19. if self.curl.getinfo(pycurl.HTTP_CODE) != 200:
  20. raise Exception("Login Fail")
  22. @check('Bitbucket')
  23. def check_repo_exist(self):
  24. self.authenticate()
  25. repos = json.loads(self.perform('https://bitbucket.org/api/1.0/user/repositories'))
  26. for repo in repos:
  27. if repo['slug'] == self.service.repo_slug_name:
  28. return False, ''
  29. raise Exception("Repository %s doesn't exist" % self.service.repo_slug_name)
  31. @check('Bitbucket')
  32. def check_branch_exist(self):
  33. self.authenticate()
  34. url = 'https://bitbucket.org/api/1.0/repositories/%s/%s/branches' % (self.username, self.service.repo_slug_name)
  35. branches = json.loads(self.perform(url))
  36. try:
  37. branches[self.service.repo_branch]
  38. except KeyError, e:
  39. raise Exception("Branch %s doesn't exist" % self.service.repo_branch)
  41. @check('Bitbucket')
  42. def check_hook_exist(self):
  43. self.authenticate()
  44. url = 'https://bitbucket.org/api/1.0/repositories/%s/%s/services' % (self.username, self.service.repo_slug_name)
  45. hooks = json.loads(self.perform(url))
  47. if type(hooks) == list:
  48. for hook in hooks:
  49. if len(hook['service']['fields']) > 0:
  50. value = hook['service']['fields'][0]['value']
  51. if value.find(str(self.service.hook_url())) != -1 and hook['service']['type'] == 'POST':
  52. return False, ''
  53. raise Exception("Hook is not set up")
  55. def check_all(self):
  56. status = self.check_authentication()
  57. if status[0] == True:
  58. return status
  60. status = self.check_repo_exist()
  61. if status[0] == True:
  62. return status
  64. status = self.check_branch_exist()
  65. if status[0] == True:
  66. return status
  68. return False, ''
